mapper.select: select count(1) from t_ds_task_definition where project_code = #{projectCode}

SELECT t.process_definition_code, d.name, count(1) as fail, max(t.restart_time) restart_time from t_ds_process_instance t join t_ds_process_definition d on d.code=t.process_definition_code where d.project_code = #{projectCode} and t.is_sub_process = 0 and t.state=6 group by t.process_definition_code, d.name order by fail desc, restart_time desc LIMIT 5

select t.task_code, d.name, count(1) as fail, max(t.start_time) start_time from t_ds_task_instance t join t_ds_task_definition d on d.code = t.task_code left join t_ds_task_definition_log define on define.code=t.task_code and define.version=t.task_definition_version where define.project_code = #{projectCode} and t.state = 6 group by t.task_code, d.name order by fail desc, start_time desc limit 5
